resources.string: API usage is significantly cheaper than fixed subscription. API-key authentication is safer than username/password authentication and API access allow you to use different API providers. App can access only API but not account info. You can revoke API key anytime without losing your account. API key is encrypted and stored only on your device.

Enter the key only if you downloaded this app from official Store or Github page or compiled from sources. We are not responsible for apps from third-party sources. Builds from third-party sources may be insecure.
Generation of hateful, harassing, or violent content
Note: Sending multiple identical reports will not solve your problem faster.
Tap to manage your API account
Set a language for voice output
Note: All images are squared. Higher resolution is more expensive and it loads slower. You can see prices on the official OpenAI page. Average price is $0.018/image.
Note: Some ROMs may not support speech recognition by Google. Whisper API is a paid API by OpenAI that requires Internet.
Tap to see app and developer info

This is the example how to use different LLMs including OpenAI ChatGPT, Facebook LLama. We (developer) are not affiliated with OpenAI or other API providers. All logos and materials are property of respective companies.
We are not responsible for assistant output. As an AI language model SpeakGPT may occasionally provide incorrect, irrelevant or offensive information.

Your chat history is saved locally but you can turn on Teslasoft ID sync. In this case your chat history will be saved on our servers for backup purposes. No data is transferred to third-party companies.
Pro tip: You can edit prompt before trying it.
SpeakGPT is an advanced and highly intuitive voice assistant that utilizes the powerful LLMs to provide you with unparalleled performance and functionality.

Note: This prompt will be sent on the start of each conversation. Please note that this feature may use additional tokens. Leave this blank empty to disable this feature. If it is not work just clear your chat history.
WARNING: We recommend to set max_tokens parameter for classifiers to avoid useless usage. Lower value will make generating process faster but may cut off output.

Some models work best if end separator is set. We recommend using \"\\n\\n###\\n\\n\" separator. It may depend on training dataset. For more info refer model\'s documentation or (if possible) inspect training data.
Something is wrong in your connection. Our servers might be unavailable or you don\'t have Internet connection.
Follow OpenAI safety principles. Do not post any inappropriate or sensitive information. All prompts are being moderated. Inappropriate prompts will be removed without further notice.
Start your message with \"Create an image\", \"Create a photo\" or \"/imagine\" to generate images.
Long press chat name to edit or delete it.

Search tricks:

Use "author:" prefix to search by author.
Use "title:" prefix to search by title.
Use "id:" prefix to search by id.
Use "cat:" prefix to search y category.
Use "type:" prefix to search by type.
ChatGPT is stuffy? Try out other models. Sometimes you may get very interesting results.
Only GPT models can remember previous messages. Other models are not optimized for it.
Sometimes some weird or useless features may appear. It because this app is in beta test.

Select text in any app and tap \"SpeakGPT\" to start conversation with assistant. This feature is available even if default assistant app feature is off. Also you can share text with SpeakGPT using default share option if SpeakGPT option is not available.
You can save your conversation with assistant. Once save button is clicked all future messages will also be saved.
SpeakGPT is too slow? Try to reduce max tokens per output.

Voice input by Google may not be supported on all devices (especially devices with no Google Services). You can switch to Whisper model in this case. Please note that Whisper is a paid API and it requires Internet connection.
To use this software you need to provide API host and APi key. SpeakGPT uses different AI APIs including OpenAI, Groq, OpenRouter, Azure.
Set if you want to use other LLMs or OpenAI is banned in your country
Set TTS Language From Chat Response
What do you want to do with this text?
Putting a system message at the start of conversation can improve answers quality and avoid \"forgetting\" information.
Objection sent. Thank you for feedback!
Long press stop recording button to cancel speech recognition and prevent generating response.

You are editing global settings. This is a template for new chats and settings for assistant. These settings don\'t apply to existing chats. To edit settings for existing chat, open the chat and click the settings icon.
Long press on setting tile to show function description. Works only on new settings UI. You can access new settings UI (Control center) by pressing on the \'lab\' icon in the regular settings.
This info is securely saved only on your device, but it might be sent to OpenAI to provide basic functionality. This data is not used to train models.
• Device info (device model, Android version, etc)

This info is used for analytics and marketing purposes. We do not share this info with third-party organizations. This info is collected only when \"Usage and diagnostics\" feature is enabled. You can also send this info manually. You are able to delete this info from our servers, reset or/and delete installation ID. You can also revoke authorization to use this data without losing access to the app.

This data is required for function \"Prompts store\". We do not collect this data unless you published a prompt. You can still delete this data by reporting a prompt or contacting us via admin@teslasoft.org. This data is stored permanently unless you request your data to be deleted. This data can be accessed by other users.

* When you install this app an installation ID will be created. This id is a random UUID string and it does not belong to Android id or any of hardware IDs. You can either reset or delete installation ID. In this case we will stop to collect data associated with installation ID.

** User-generated content is all content created and published by users using this app. We may review public content for violations and remove inappropriate content. We don\'t have access to private content (like chats list, conversations, etc)
This page describes which data we use and why.
Even if you decompile the app and remove this screen we may still collect this data. By using this app, you are agree with our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

Your donation has been verified. Donations and ads help us to keep this app up to date, provide you with high-quality experience and release new features. Now you can enjoy ad free experience! This license is lifetime. If you want to activate the license on another device, please contact us.

IMPORTANT NOTE:\nIf you still see ads you might need to restart the app. Please note that if you used installation ID to activate the license, ads may appear once you reinstall the app. Please contact us for a new license or use Android ID to activate license in this case. Android ID is unique for each app and it is persistent until you perform a factory reset. Installation ID is temporary and it changes after app reinstall or and when you manually reset it/revoke authorization.
Leave API key field blank if you don\'t want to change API key.

This data is provided for informational purposes only. Cost is calculated based on your model and text only messages. Additional charges may occurr for processing/generating images. We added this card to help users understand their usage and how does the cost is calculated.

Changes are saved automatically. Usually you don\'t need to alter temperature, top_p, frequency penalty, presence penalty and seed params. But if you need to do so you can. Please note that it\'s not recommended to change both temperature and top_p params as you may receive unexpected results. The default temperature is 0.7, default top_p is 1.0 and default values for penalties are 0.0.
Please note that DALL-E 3 supports only 1024x1024 images. If you select another resolution with DALL-E 3 you will receive an error.
Default API endpoint label can not be edited
Default API endpoint can not be deleted
At least 1 API endpoint must be set
Logit bias must be in range from -100 to 100
Please fill token or token ID field

Logit Bias Config is a feature that allows you to set custom logit bias for specific tokens. Logit bias is a value that is added to the logit of the token. It can be used to increase or decrease the probability of the token in the output sequence. For example, if you set logit bias to 100, the token will be more likely to appear in the output sequence. If you set logit bias to -100, the token will be less likely to appear in the output sequence.
Are you sure you want to clear this log?
Error, no model name is provided
This feature allows you to manage your OpenAI account.
This feature allows you to set SpeakGPT as your default assistant.
This feature allows you to set your API endpoint.
This feature allows you to enable or disable messages auto send. When auto send is enabled, SpeakGPT will automatically send messages without pressing \'Send\' button once listening is finished.
This feature allows you to set your TTS voice.
This feature allows you to set your TTS voice language.
This feature allows you to set image generation model.
This feature allows you to set image resolution. Please note that DALL-e 3 supports only 1024x1024.
This feature allows you to set TTS engine. OpenAI TTS is paid.
This feature allows you to set STT engine. Whisper is paid.
This feature allows you let SpeakGPT never pronounce answers.
This feature allows you let SpeakGPT always pronounce answers.
This feature allows you to set text generation model as well as model\'s params.
This feature allows you to set activation prompt which will be sent as a first user message.
This feature allows you to set system message which will be sent as a system message.
This feature allows you to enable automatic language detection of speech.
Classic layout is a chat layout like on the official ChatGPT website.
This feature allows you to enable slash commands. Please note that this feature is experimental and unstable. Example: /imagine a cat.

This feature allows you to enable desktop mode. When desktop mode is enabled, SpeakGPT will use keyboard shortcuts and message input will be automatically focused. Press \'Enter\' to send message, \'Shift + Enter\' to add new line and \'Shift+Esc\' to close chat. Not recommended to use on phones unless you want keyboard to be opened every time you open the chat.
This feature allows you to enable new experimental UI. New UI is more compact and intuitive.
This feature allows you to open about SpeakGPT page.
This feature allows you to clear chat history.
This feature allows you to open SpeakGPT documentation.
This feature allows you to enable AMOLED mode for supported displays. It can significantly save battery. AMOLED mode is only available in dark theme.

This feature allows you to lock assistant window. When assistant window is locked, it can not be closed by pressing back button or swiping window down. But you can use \'exit\' button. This feature can prevent accidental closing of assistant window and losing unsaved conversation.
This feature allows you change assistant\'s name and avatar for individual chat or globally.
This feature allows you to delete all diagnostics data collected by SpeakGPT. This action can not be undone.
This feature allows you to get new installation ID.

This feature allows you to revoke authorization. After you revoke your authorization this app will stop collecting data and delete data from their servers. Logging will be disabled so it will be harder to find and report bugs.
This feature allows you to view crash log.
This feature allows you to view ads log. Usually you don\'t need to use this feature.
This feature allows you to view event log. We do not collect this log as it may contain sensitive information. Use this log if you want to report a bug.
This feature allows you to enable auto-save chats in assistant window. When auto-save chats is enabled, SpeakGPT will save all chats to the device storage.
This feature allows you to enable chat errors. When chat errors is enabled, SpeakGPT will show errors in chat of occurred.
Are you sure? This action can not be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete your data? After data deletion request is sent all logs will be deleted and all analytics data sent to us will be deleted from our servers. Would you like to continue?

Would you like to opt out from usage and diagnostics data collection? This data is used to improve SpeakGPT and fix bugs. Please note that SpeakGPT may still create logs on your device. Logs are saved locally. If you want to prevent this app from writing logs, please revoke authorization. Would you like to opt-out now?
Would you like to enable usage and diagnostics data collection? We may collect crash logs, usage info, events in order to improve SpeakGPT and fix bugs.

After this action a new installation ID will be assigned. Authorization will be granted and SpeakGPT will continue to write logs. Logs will not be sent to us unless \'Usage and diagnostics\' option is enabled. Are you sure you want to continue?
Would you like to reset installation ID additionally? After you do this all info we collected will no longer be associated with your device.
Your prompt contains inappropriate content and can not be processed. We strive to make AI safe and relevant for everyone.
You are currently offline. Please check your connection and try again.

Your API key is incorrect. Change it in Settings > Change OpenAI key. If you think this is an error please check if your API key has not been rotated. If you accidentally published your key it might be automatically revoked.
An error occurred while generating response. It may be due to a weak connection or high demand. Try again later.
You exceeded your current quota. If you had free trial usage please add payment info. Also please check your usage limits. You can change your limits in Account settings.

Looks like this model (%s) is not available to you right now. It can be because of high demand or this model is currently in limited beta. If you are using a fine-tuned model, please make sure you entered correct model name.
Could not connect to the server. It may happen when your Internet speed is slow or too many users are using this model at the same time. Try to switch to another model.
Too many tokens. It is an internal error, please report it. Also try to truncate your input. Sometimes it may help.
No valid model is set in settings. Please change the model and try again.
An error has been occurred during generation. See the error details below:

SpeakGPT allows you to interact with ChatGPT Vision using your photos taken directly from camera in this app. To enable camera for GPT Vision please allow us to use your camera. You can still pick your existing pictures from gallery without camera permission. Allow camera access?
SpeakGPT allows you to interact with ChatGPT via voice activation. To enable voice activation please allow this app to use your device microphone. Allow microphone access?
You can not use this feature because app do not have camera access.
You can not use this feature because app do not have microphone access.
An error is occurred while analyzing file. The file might be corrupted or invalid.
Server error. Please try again later.
Failed to post prompt. Please check your Internet connection.
This action can not be undone.
API endpoint has changed to support this model.
"An error occurred while fetching models. Please check your Internet and API key and try again later. Error message: "
An error occurred while fetching models. Please check your Internet and API key and try again later.
Are you sure you want to delete this API endpoint?
Are you sure you want to delete this config?
Are you sure you want to delete this message?
Cost: Error calculating cost. Please check your connection.
Cost: <SpeakGPT hasn\'t enough data to calculate cost for this model. Look for documentation and calculate cost manually based on the usage above.>
